content.prompt: The format of the work shown reflects the influence on Japanese art of traditional art forms from

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
